generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There is a sidewalk visible on the right side of the image, adjacent to the road, with pedestrians and some street furniture.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings with windows and commercial signs are visible along the street.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the sidewalk and street, providing greenery.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- rider: A person riding a motorcycle is visible in the middle of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible in the image, including a blue car and a silver car in the foreground.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible in the middle of the road, being ridden by a person.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the right side of the image, showing a red light.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the left side of the image, indicating parking.
- truck: A military-style truck is visible on the left side of the image.
